title: Redesign payment success screen with green/white split background and sender details

requirements.text: Update the PaymentSuccess component to display a two-tone background with green covering the top 1/3 of the screen and white covering the bottom 2/3

quotes: Green background from the very top to 1/3 of the upper side

acceptanceCriteria: The top third of the PaymentSuccess screen has a green background
The bottom two-thirds of the PaymentSuccess screen has a white background
The transition between green and white sections is clean and aligned

requirements.text: Position the text 'Paid to [recipient name]' at the top-center of the white background section in the PaymentSuccess component, where [recipient name] is replaced with the actual receiver name from the payment form

quotes: from the white color background top center add paid to recipient name

acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Paid to [name]' appears at the top-center of the white section
The recipient name is dynamically populated from the payment form data
The text is clearly visible and properly styled

requirements.text: Keep the existing green checkmark tick circle exactly as it is in the PaymentSuccess component, maintaining its current position, size, and styling

quotes: let the tick mark circle stay as it is

acceptanceCriteria: The green checkmark circle remains unchanged in appearance
The checkmark circle maintains its current position in the layout
No visual changes are made to the checkmark or its circle background

requirements.text: Add a 'Paid from [Sender name]' text field in the lower portion of the white background area in the PaymentSuccess component, where [Sender name] is a placeholder or user-entered value
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Paid from [Sender name]' appears in the lower white section
The text is positioned below the 'Paid to' section and checkmark
The sender name can be displayed as a static value or from form data

requirements.text: Add the text 'HDFC Bank XXXX XXXX 7128' directly below the 'Paid from [Sender name]' text in the PaymentSuccess component

quotes: Below that add HDFC bank XXXX XXXX 7128

acceptanceCriteria: The bank account details 'HDFC Bank XXXX XXXX 7128' are displayed
The text appears immediately below the 'Paid from' line
The formatting matches the visual style of other payment details

requirements.text: Add a Transaction ID field below the bank details in the PaymentSuccess component that allows users to manually enter or view a transaction ID

quotes: Below that add transaction ID to fill Manually

acceptanceCriteria: A transaction ID field is displayed below the bank account details
The field shows a label indicating it is for transaction ID entry
The field is positioned in the lower portion of the white section as specified

constraints: The green checkmark tick circle must remain exactly as it currently appears
The top 1/3 green and bottom 2/3 white background split must be precise
All new elements must be added to the existing PaymentSuccess component without breaking current functionality
nonGoals: Modifying the payment form input fields
Changing the navigation or other pages
Implementing backend storage for sender name or transaction ID
Adding validation logic for the transaction ID field
Modifying the green checkmark icon color (already implemented in previous feature)
